posts.title: Welcome to my blog
posts.contents: This is my first blog post. So welcome and I hope you enjoy what I write here. It will mostly be things written for my own amusement and reflection, though hopefully you may find something interesting or helpful here.

posts.title: Post 2
posts.contents: Similar to the first post but with twice the excitement.

posts.title: Testing Images
posts.contents: Writing html from a JSON to create images in the blog.
